revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Connecting Cave |image = [[File:Connecting Cave.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Connecting Cave. |tokens = 475,000 |location = Between Routes 7 and 8, next to Cyllage City. }} '''Connecting Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 6,503,370 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->

Base Health |- | rowspan=4|[[File:Axew.png|40px]] Axew || rowspan=4|<center> 51,738,600 ||rowspan=4|[[File:Pokémon_Breeder_(female).png|40px]] Pokémon Breeder Mercy || [[File:Ducklett.png|40px]] Ducklett || <center> 13,374,965 |- | [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu || <center> 14,465,837 |- | [[File:Litleo.png|40px]] Litleo || <center> 17,438,602 |- | [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Oddish || <center> 19,365,784 |}
